name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A mesmerizing tale of love, ambition, and tragedy set against the backdrop of the roaring twenties.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
review: A poignant exploration of racial injustice and moral growth in a small Southern town.

author: George Orwell

review: A timeless coming-of-age novel that captures the angst and alienation of adolescence.

review: A magical journey into the wizarding world filled with adventure, friendship, and the battle between good and evil.
